entry.name: QUnit.done
entry.title: QUnit.done()
entry.desc: Register a callback to fire whenever the test suite ends.
entry.longdesc: QUnit.done() is called whenever all the tests have finished running. failed is the number of failures that occurred. total is the total number of assertions that occurred, passed the passing assertions. runtime is the time in milliseconds to run the tests from start to finish.

option.name: failed
option.desc: The number of failures that occurred.

option.name: passed
option.desc: The number of tests that passed assertions.

option.name: total
option.desc: The total number of assertions that occurred.

option.name: runtime
option.desc: The time in milliseconds it took tests to run from start to finish.

example.desc: Register a callback that logs test results to the console.
